table_description: Balance information for the current account.

columns.name: account_balance
columns.description: Current balance of the customer's most recent billing activity. Does not reflect month_to_date_usage.

columns.name: generated_at
columns.description: The time at which balances were most recently generated.

columns.name: month_to_date_balance
columns.description: Balance as of the generated_at time. This value includes the account_balance and month_to_date_usage.

columns.name: month_to_date_usage
columns.description: Amount used in the current billing period as of the generated_at time.
